comments.body:
Please add `license_file: LICENSE` to include the license in the conda package so as to be compliant with the MIT license.

Also could add `license_family: MIT`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@about:
  home: https://github.com/Changaco/setuptools_scm_git_archive/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
